### Templating

[]{style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Calibri','sans-serif'"} 

In DockingManager, we can customize Autohide button, Menu button, Close button, Side button.

1.   Select DockingManager and go to Object Menu.

2.   Select EditAdditionalTemplate as shown in the image below:

![](../ImagesExt/image261_103.png){border="0"}

Figure 104: Templating

Floating window can be customized using the following properties,

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowActiveBorderBrush

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowActiveHeaderBackground

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowBackground

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowBorderBrush

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowBorderThickness

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowContentBackground

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowContentBorderBrush

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowContentBorderThickness

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowContentMargin

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowCornerRadius

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowHeaderBackground

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}FloatWindowRect

Docked window can be customized using the following properties,

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}Window Background

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowBorderBrush

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowBorderThickness

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowContentBackground

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowContentBorderBrush

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowContentBorderThickness

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowContentConrnerRadius

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowContentMargin

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowCornerRadius

[·      ]{style="FONT-FAMILY: Symbol"}WindowForeGround

 

We can customize the AutoHide button, Menu Button, and Close Button by editing their control templates respectively. The custom style applied for these three buttons are as follows:
